head.title: Metro Briefing | Calendar: Tomorrow: Insurance After Sept. 11

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | Calendar: Tomorrow: Insurance After Sept. 11

block.p: The New York State Legislature has scheduled a public hearing on insurance issues after the Sept. 11 terror attack, including how quickly consumer claims are processed and the financial health of the industry. Assembly Hearing Room, 19th floor, Room 1923, 250 Broadway, Manhattan, 10:30 a.m. Information: (518) 455-3888.
